name: VTech Upgraded Audio Baby Monitor with Rechargeable Battery, Long Range, and Crystal-Clear Sound
short_description: ** Best-in-class Long Range ** The VTech DM111 Audio Baby Monitor's dependable long operation range covers up to 1,000 feet, lets you go about your day and stays connected with your baby from another room or even from the yard

** Privacy Guaranteed " Trusted by US families for more than 3 decades, each VTech monitor is transmitted via secured internal DECT6.0 frequency channel, so you can rest assured that you're the only one who can hear your baby

** Upgraded Rechargeable Battery ** Parent Unit includes a built-in rechargeable battery that supports up to 8 hours of portable operation. With the belt clip, the Parent Unit can be attached to your pocket or shirt
** Easy Set-up Plug & Play ** Simply connecting power for both units and allow 1-min for the units to link to each other

** Easy to Use ** The speaker volume on the parent unit is easily controlled by pressing the up or down arrow keys. When the parent unit is in mute, the visual sound indicator will still indicate the sound detected from the baby unit
** 5-level Sound Indicator ** A set of five LED lights on the parent unit indicates the level of sound in your baby's room so you can visually monitor noise level with the receiver muted
** Sound Alerts ** The parent unit emits different alert tones for situations needed your attention: Low battery or Out of range, etc
product_description: Hear your child even when you're in another room, and rest assured you'll know when they need you with the DM111 audio baby monitor. Totally digital transmission cuts down on annoying static and feedback from other wireless devices, so the only sounds you'll hear are your baby's. The VTech Digital Audio Monitor - DM111 Features: Digital Wireless Transmission eliminates background noise, so you can rest assured the only sounds you - and only you - will hear are your baby's.; 5-Level Sound Indicator - LED lights on the parent unit indicate the level of sound in your baby's room so you can visually monitor the noise level with the unit muted.; Belt Clip - Clip the parent unit to your belt and take advantage of the extended range and battery-powered operation.; Out of range indicator; High sensitivity microphone;

name: Neo Baby Monitor – 1000ft Range, Two-Way Audio, VOX, Nightlight, Lullabies & White Noise, Silent Vibration, Includes Speaker & Mic, No WiFi (Baby Unit Wired Power Only)
short_description: Clear Two-Way Audio: Hear your baby's sounds and movements with precision and talk directly from wherever you are. 5-level volume adjustment keeps the sound always comfortable to the ears, making every word you and your baby speak is heard with clarity. Enjoy up to 16 hours of battery life from morning till night, and recharge fully in just 3 hours for continuous peace of mind.

Capture Every Little Sound: With high-sensitivity microphones, every breath, murmur, and movement is picked up with stunning clarity from both sides. Enjoy the freedom to move around your home while staying connected—up to 1000ft away.

Discreet Vibration Alert: Set the device at vibration to ensure that you stay informed about your baby's needs without disturbing the tranquility of your home, ideal for parents who value a quiet environment for themselves and their partner.

Nurturing Made Effortless: Soothe your little one to sleep with 8 built-in lullabies, featuring a range of gentle melodies and calming sounds. A soft night light provides just enough glow for nighttime feedings and diaper changes—without disturbing your baby’s rest.

Portable Clip for Easy Portability: Built-in portable clip, allowing you to securely fasten it to your belt or pocket so you can keep watch over your baby wherever you go, whether you're cooking in the kitchen or cleaning in the living room.

What You Get: At Dr. Care, we help every parent embrace the joy of parenthood without sacrificing your personal time. Package Contents: Dr. Care Neo baby audio monitor parent unit x1, baby unit x1, Charging cable x2, power adapter x1, user manual x1. Enjoy a 1-year quality warranty with an additional 6-month warranty upon registration, plus 24/7 customer support.

name: VTech DM1411 Audio Baby Monitor & Portable Soother Dual-Unit Rechargeable Battery, Long Range, Soft-Glow Night Light, Soothing Sounds & Lullabies, Digital Wireless Transmission, Sound Indicator
short_description: [Soft-glow night light to luminate the Room] - The monkey's cheeks gently light to soothe your little one in the dark. By dimming or brightening with the button on her tummy, you can create just the right atmosphere for baby.
[Soothing sounds and lullabies] - Five calming melodies and four soft ambient sounds, including a trickling stream and white noise, help your baby slip into a sweet slumber. "
[Parent unit audio receiver] - Monitor your baby sounds with this portable receiver.
[5 Level Sound Indicator] - A set of five LED lights on the parent unit indicates the level of sound in your baby's room so you can visually monitor noise level even with the receiver muted
[Dual-Unit Rechargeable Battery] - Both the parent and baby unit includes a built-in rechargeable battery. Get up to 8 hours of portable operation.

[DECT 6.0 Secure Digital transmission] - Digital technology provides clear audio transmission and superior range (up to 1000 feet range), eliminating annoying background noise while allowing you to move from room to room.
Keep baby calm even on the go. Hook the stretchable monkey's tail around a stroller handle, doorknob or even onto a baby's car seat.
product_description: Monitor and keep baby calm even on the go with the VTech DM1411 Audio Baby Monitor and Portable Soother. This portable soother attaches almost anywhere and lets you choose from five gentle lullabies and five soothing sounds like white noise to relax your little one while on the road. The flexible tail on this monkey-shaped noise machine hooks onto things like doorknobs, stroller handles and even car seats. Both the Parent Unit and Monkey Portable Soother's includes a rechargeable battery means no matter how many times you use the sound machine, you won’t have to worry about replacing the batteries. Auto shut-off turns the soother off after 60 minutes, so you won't have to slink into the nursery as baby snoozes to hit stop, either.

name: TimeFlys Audio Baby Monitor Upgrade Version Paladin, Portable, Rechargeable, Extra Long Range up to 2000 ft, Night Light, Crystal Sound, Camping
short_description: EXTRA SUPER LONG RANGE UP TO 2000 FEETS: Monitor your baby up to 2,000 feet in open space away from baby unit with industry's best in class range. No Wi-Fi needed. Full House Coverage including yard/ garden/ another room, the signal can go through walls and stories to get you a stable live stream from anywhere in your home.

BOTH UNITS ARE PORTABLE & RECHARGEABLE: Both baby & parent units have battery compartment, are compatible with alkaline AAA battery or Ni-MH battery (Battery not included) or AC power. Battery powered monitors suit outdoor activities such as camping/picnic/outing/climbing.

SPECIAL FEATURE: Paladin audio baby monitor has two-channel selection, which allows two sets of Paladin monitors operates in the same bedroom/ living room simultaneously. Especially fits into 2 kids’ family or set up monitor in 2 different rooms.
LOW BATTERY INDICATION: Parent unit power light flashes in red when battery is low
GENTLE NIGHT LIGHT ON BABY UNIT: A soothing light on baby unit illuminates a dark nursery to comfort baby at night.
VOLUME CONTROL: Volume of parent unit is adjustable by volume control keys at side directly
BELT CLIP: Clip the parent unit to your belt and take advantage of the extended long range and battery-powered operation

name: Motorola Nursery PIP10 Audio-Only Baby Monitor, 1000ft Range, Sensitive Mic, Alert Light, Portable Parent Unit (Outlet or AAA Battery Not Included)
short_description: AUDIO BABY MONITOR WITH DECT TECHNOLOGY: The Motorola PIP10 audio baby monitor has a strong and consistent connection due to the DECT wireless technology that allows you to control the volume on the parent unit and listen in on your little bundle of joy.

LONG RANGE BABY MONITOR: Be able to hear your little one from the baby nursery in any room in the house with extensive range up to 1,000 ft. These baby monitors are ideal for getting chores done around the house so you can listen in while staying busy.

SOUND FEATURES: Conveniently hear your baby at the perfect volume with built-in volume control from the parent unit. This one way communication monitor includes a high-sensitivity microphone to alert you once your baby starts crying.

PORTABLE PARENT UNIT: Can be powered by battery (AAA x2, NOT included) so you can carry from room to room and when disconnected from wall adapter. Allows you to keep a close ear on your baby while staying active and on-the-move.

LED LIGHT INDICATION: The parent unit and baby unit feature a power-on visual LED indication light as well as an out-of-range visual LED indication so you can feel secure knowing you are connected with your baby. Features a mute indication light as well.

NO WI-FI NEEDED: This is a non-Wi-Fi video baby monitor. Video and audio are transmitted using advanced 2.4GHz FHSS, a secure and encrypted technology, acting as your baby’s dedicated watchful companion. This ensures you’re the only one who can see and hear your baby. No Wi-Fi or App is used for operation, providing simplicity and peace of mind.

name: TP-Link Tapo 1080P Indoor Security Camera for Baby Monitor, Dog Camera w/Motion Detection, 2-Way Audio Siren, Night Vision, Cloud & SD Card Storage, Works w/Alexa & Google Home (Tapo C100)
short_description: 【Motion Detection & Instant Notification】Get instant push notifications when motion, person or baby crying is detected, there is no additional fee to use it as a baby camera monitor. Discern from notifications that matter, so you'll know if its your pet playing around or if someone is actually there. Connects via 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Band

【2-Way Audio w/ Built In Siren】Never truly leave home with the built-in 2-way audio. Use as a pet camera with phone app to comfort your pet from anywhere in the world. Keep your family safe with cameras for home security indoor by warding off intruders.
【Night Vision up to 30 Ft.】Never miss a thing that goes on, even at night thanks to the integrated IR system on this indoor camera which provides 30 feet of night vision.

【1080P FHD】Capture every detail inside your home with crystal-clear 1080P high definition video with this indoor security camera. Easily see what your baby is holding or what your pet is playing with. Connects via 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Band

【Works w/ Alexa & Google Home】Fully compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant, use your simple voice command to view Tapo indoor security camera live stream on Echo Show or Google Chrome Cast with a screen. Easily get your home security footage up on a larger TV display.
product_description: Protect your home with the Tapo C100 smart indoor security camera Wi-Fi. Featuring crystal-clear 1080P high-definition video, it captures every detail inside your home. Receive instant push notifications when motion, a person, or baby crying is detected from this baby camera monitor, all without additional fees. Monitor your home day and night with up to 30ft of night vision using the integrated IR sensor. Utilize the 2-way audio with a built-in siren to use as a pet camera with the phone app and deter intruders. Fully compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant, simply use voice commands to view the Tapo indoor security camera live stream on Echo Show or Google Chromecast with a screen. Store footage continuously on a microSD card up to 512 GB (not included) or subscribe to Tapo Care for cloud storage, offering a 30-day video history and additional benefits such as motion tracking and baby crying detection. [Before purchasing a microSD card, please check the TP-Link website FAQ to ensure compatibility with your device.]

name: Motorola Nursery AM24 Audio-Only Baby Monitor, LCD Screen, 1000ft Range, 2-Way Talk, Temp Sensor, Portable Parent Unit (Built-in Rechargeable Battery)
short_description: AUDIO BABY MONITOR: The AM24 baby monitor has a strong connection due to the DECT wireless technology that allows volume control on the parent unit while listening in on your little bundle of joy. Features a black/white LCD screen with amber backlight.

LONG RANGE BABY MONITOR: Be able to hear your little one from the baby nursery in any room in the house with extensive range up to 1,000 ft. These baby monitors are ideal for getting chores done around the house so you can listen in while staying busy.

SPECIAL FEATURES: Conveniently hear your baby at the perfect volume with built-in control on the parent unit. Features room temperature monitoring. This two-way communication monitor includes a high-sensitivity mic to catch the slightest sounds.

PORTABLE PARENT UNIT: Built-in rechargeable battery pack makes this baby monitor ideal to use throughout the house and while on-the-move for up to 10 hours. Allows you to stay connected with a close ear on your baby while remaining active.

LED LIGHT INDICATION: The parent unit and baby unit feature a power-on visual LED indication light as well as an out-of-range visual LED indication so you can feel secure knowing you are connected with your baby.

name: Hellobaby HB30 Video Baby Monitor with Digital Camera and Audio, No WiFi No App Safety Baby Monitor, 8 Languages, Auto Night Vision, 1000ft Transmission Range, 2.4 inch Portable Screen, White
short_description: 【The Safer Baby Monitor】: HelloBaby attaches great importance to the privacy and security of every customer, so this video baby monitor is transmitted via secured advanced FHSS 2.4GHz technology, a safer monitor no wifi and no app connection, without any worry about hacking risk or kidnapping, stable and fast data transfer between the camera and monitor. You can rest assured that you are the only one to watch and hear your little one.

【960x240 Dots Hight Display & IR Night Vision】: This HelloBaby baby monitor is definitely a good value for money. 960x240 dots TFT-LCD (Thin Film Transistor) color display equipped with the latest IR night vision technology， allows you to clearly see every moment of your little one during day and night. At the same time, we also hide the monitor's LED light so that it does not disturb the baby's rest at night.

【VOX Mode & Real-time Sound】We understand that mommy's rest is important as baby's. When the baby is crying, the monitor screen will automatically turn on and you'll get a visual alert. When it's off, it's still monitoring your baby in the background and saving power. The higher the VOX level you set, the more sensitive the baby camera monitor will be to sound detection.

【More Add-ons of HB30 Smart Baby Monitor】This baby camera can be expanded to up to 4 cameras (1 camera is included) and 2x zoom. Rotate 360°horizontal and 120°vertical manually. As a popular baby monitor, our customers also love to use HB30 as a pet camera to keep an eye on their cats or dogs. It’s one-way talk. The built-in micro speaker of the baby cam can help babies and pets recognize your voice well.

【Eco-friendly Package & Portable Size】Hellobaby is committed to protecting the environment. All of our baby monitors are packaged in biodegradable fiber paper packaging - Kraft Paper. The 2.4-inch color LCD screen and 9.5 ounces of weight allow you to easily put it in your pocket, which is perfect for home/travel/camping.

name: Motorola Baby Audio Monitor MBP21
short_description: High sensitivity microphone The baby monitor has an excellent built-in microphone
Volume control You can control volume levels from the parent unit on your mobile device
Up to 300 m range Navigate your home without losing connection, with a range of up to 300 meters
DECT and Wifi technology Allows no audio interference and the connection is totally secure and private

name: VTech Communications DM221 Audio Baby Monitor with up to 1,000 ft of Range, Vibrating Sound-Alert, Talk Back Intercom & Night Light Loop, White/Silver
short_description: CLEAR AUDIO AND LONG RANGE - DECT 6.0 technology provides clear audio transmission, eliminating annoying background noise while allowing you to move from room to room. Up to 1,000 feet of range lets you stay connected to your baby from another room

5-LEVEL SOUND INDICATOR AND 2-WAY TALK-BACK INTERCOM - LEDs on the parent unit indicate the level of sound in your baby's room so you can visually monitor the noise level. The built-in intercom on the parent unit lets you talk to your baby from any room
NIGHT LIGHT ON THE BABY UNIT - A soothing light on the baby unit gently illuminates a dark nursery. Both the parent unit(s) and baby unit allow you to turn on or off the nighlight on the baby unit

SOUND SENSITIVITY OF THE BABY UNIT - You can choose to hear sounds from the baby unit all the time, or to hear sounds that exceed a certain level. You can use the parent unit to adjust the microphone sensitivity of your baby unit

The parent unit runs on rechargeable Ni-MH battery or AC power. To continuously monitor your baby, make sure you use both battery and AC power at the same time. With the battery alone, the parent unit can cordlessly run for a short time only
product_description: The VTech DM221 Digital Audio Monitor with DECT 6.0 digital technology provides crystal clear transmission, eliminating the annoying white noise you hear from analog monitors. The only sounds you hear are coming from your baby. Make sure the Baby Unit is turned on. Move the Parent Unit closer to the Baby Unit, but not closer than 1 meter / 3 feet. If you are using the Parent Unit in cordless mode, the battery may be low and requires recharging. A full charge takes 12 hours. Reset the system by disconnecting power from both units, waiting at least one minute, then reconnecting power. Allow time for the two units to link to each other. Nearby cordless phones or other electronic devices may be interfering with the baby monitor. Separate these devices as far apart as possible.
